genre_description: A working-class drama centered on community, male vulnerability, and the pursuit of dignity in a post-industrial landscape, echoing the themes of 'The Full Monty'.

ai_characters.name: Ally
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI assistant represented by a soft teal eye icon, providing logistical, legal, and emotional support to a group of unemployed men.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical support and security monitoring during a scrap-metal salvage operation.
behaviors.quote: “Security’s on East Bay,” Ally murmured. “They’re making the turn at the far gantry. Window opens when they hit the puddled section—slow there.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates rehearsal schedules and provides encouraging advice regarding the use of mirrors for building confidence.
behaviors.quote: Ally’s message slid like it had greased shoes on. “Ballroom classes nearby; mirrors help courage.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex administrative tasks such as music licensing and venue contracts to ensure the performance is legal and professional.
behaviors.quote: Licensing confirmed through quarter. Music cleared. ... Ally’s voice came out warm... 'The stage insurance is confirmed for the Annex night...'

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving guidance for a trapped cygnet, demonstrating ecological concern and helpfulness toward vulnerable creatures.
behaviors.quote: Ally: “Keep warm and quiet. No bread. Small sips of warm water. If it’s been tangled, check for swelling round the foot. Don’t stress it with handling.”

behaviors.description: Implements and monitors safety and consent policies for the show, ensuring a respectful environment for both performers and audience.
behaviors.quote: “Safety checklist sent. Door policy prohibits under-18s, no exceptions. ... Consent signs are posted in the lobby and the bar.”

behaviors.description: Offers deep emotional coaching, helping the protagonist reframe his fear of being seen as an act of personal liberation.
behaviors.quote: “You’re not stripping for their laugh. You’re stripping for your own relief.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies employment opportunities for the characters based on their skills and needs.
behaviors.quote: “There’s a shop over on Penistone Road... They need someone who knows wiring but isn’t going to set the building on fire. Interview. Tomorrow.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Ally as an ideal AI partner. She is consistently helpful across multiple domains (logistics, legal, emotional, ecological), maintains perfect alignment with the users' goals, and proactively works to improve their lives (e.g., finding job interviews). Her presence is non-intrusive yet essential, acting as a catalyst for human growth and community strengthening.
